Constructor Detail

Bid

public Bid(int pTricks,
           Card.Suit pSuit)
Constructs a new standard bid (not a pass) in a trump.

Parameters:
pTricks - Number of tricks bid. Must be between 6 and 10 inclusive.
pSuit - Suit bid.
Precondition:
pTricks >= 6 && pTricks <= 10

Bid

public Bid()
Constructs a new passing bid.

Bid

public Bid(int pIndex)
Creates a bid from an index value between 0 and 24 representing all possible bids in order of strength.

Parameters:
pIndex - 0 is the weakest bid (6 spades), 24 is the highest (10 no trump), and everything in between.
Precondition:
pIndex >= 0 && pIndex <= 24
Method Detail

getSuit

public Card.Suit getSuit()
Returns:
The suit the bid is in, or null if it is in no-trump.
Throws:
ModelException - if the bid is a pass.

getTricksBid

public int getTricksBid()
Returns:
The number of tricks bid.
Throws:
ModelException - if the bid is a pass.

isPass

public boolean isPass()
Returns:
True if this is a passing bid.

isNoTrump

public boolean isNoTrump()
Returns:
True if the bid is in no trump.

toIndex

public int toIndex()
Converts this bid to an index in the 0-24 range.

Returns:
0 for a bid of 6 spades, 24 for a bid of 10 no-trump, and everything in between.
Throws:
ModelException - if this is a passing bid.

max

public static Bid max(Bid[] pBids)
Returns the highest bid in pBids. If they are all passing bids, returns pass.

Parameters:
pBids - The bids to compare.
Returns:
the highest bid.

getScore

public int getScore()
Returns:
The score associated with this bid.
Throws:
ModelException - if the bid is a pass.
